revised_title: The Influence of Water Masses on Plankton and Marine Life
tldr: The author discusses the importance of understanding the movement and mixing of water masses in the ocean and their impact on plankton and marine life. They explain how mixing of different water masses can lead to increased productivity and affect the survival of fish broods and larvae. The author also highlights the role of external metabolites released by marine organisms, which can influence the growth of other species and the overall ecosystem.
